title: Problems in wearing lenses

body: Hello. I have nearsightedness -3.5 of both eyes. In July 2022, he had conjunctivitis (in one eye). After treatment, dry eye syndrome developed. I treated him for about 2 months (VitA-Pos ointmen ...

title: There's a bruise on my leg
author: Anonymous question
body: In the third pregnancy, he appeared on his leg like a bruise, but 100% did not hit. The formation is slightly convex and does not hurt. It has been preserved for 3.5 years. It got a little bigger ...
